message: Can I use Microsoft SharePoint 2013 to be my ASP.NET application portal - SharePoint Stack Exchange? http://sharepoint.stackexchange.com/questions/69919/can-i-use-microsoft-sharepoint-2013-to-be-my-asp-net-application-portal
story: Emad Mokhtar Habib shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Can I use Microsoft SharePoint 2013 to be my ASP.NET application portal - SharePoint Stack Exchange
caption: sharepoint.stackexchange.com
description: I'm not an expert in SharePoint but what I know that SharePoint 2013 Foundation Edition is free, and I'm developing ASP.NET applcation which will have a portal. I'm wondering Can I user SharePoint 2013 Foundation as my application portal? I'll use this portal to show visual reports (SSRS reports) in...
